description: This file defines a class BindingSetRequest which extends Request and represents a specific type of request in the mock Zigbee core request handling system. The class includes a constructor and an execute method that sends a response.
external_methods: new Response(int requestId, int code, String message).send()

classes.name: BindingSetRequest
classes.description: Represents a binding set request in the mock Zigbee core request system, allowing the simulation of a binding set operation.

methods.name: BindingSetRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a given request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the request's main action, sending a response with a success code.
